divs: sighting detailswife came home @ 8:30 (oct. 7th) and sighted orange\gold cigar\disc off horizon from car before pulling into driveway over susqehanna river. size approx. 200 yards in length @ 1 mile in distance from vantage point. did not tell me till 9:45ish (said she didn't know how she forgot to tell me because she was in duress and very excited over sighting) told her mind control, ;-) kidding saw 2 helicopters flying around area afterwards. then, later i saw stretched bowtie shaped ufo around 2:30am (oct. 8th) track river from north to south for 2 miles then south to north west back 3 miles over the course of about 30 seconds. ufo was whitish blue, long slender rectangle with bowtie ends. ufo had red, blue, orange and green lights pulsing over surface, and not always in same location on surface of ufo. i saw ufo through binoculars for about 10-15 seconds before it went behind treetops. next morning helicopters and 4 a-10 warthogs we sighted in same area. (note: a-10's frequent area, but only in singles or pairs.) please advise if there were any conclusive concurrent sightings please
trends: There have been no other sightings in East Prospect
This sighting has never been favorited.
